projectName: Gold Predictor v2 - Advanced Trading Features
description: Enhance Gold Predictor with news sentiment analysis, economic calendar integration, multi-timeframe analysis, advanced risk management, performance tracking, and backtesting capabilities.

userStories.title: Daily Loss Limit Protection
userStories.description: As a trader, I want the bot to stop trading if daily losses exceed a threshold to protect my account.
acceptanceCriteria: Track daily P&L from all closed trades
Configurable daily loss limit (default: 3% of account)
Block new trades when limit reached
userStories.notes: Implemented RiskManager with daily P&L tracking, loss limit protection, and API endpoints

userStories.title: Volatility-Adjusted Position Sizing
userStories.description: As a trader, I want position sizes to adjust based on current volatility (smaller in high volatility).
acceptanceCriteria: Calculate current ATR vs 20-period average ATR
Reduce position size when ATR > 1.5x average
Increase position size when ATR < 0.7x average
userStories.notes: Implemented volatility-adjusted sizing using ATR ratio with configurable thresholds

userStories.title: Trailing Stop-Loss Implementation
userStories.description: As a trader, I want trailing stops that lock in profits as the trade moves in my favor.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement trailing stop logic in Capital.com connector
Trailing activates after trade is in profit by X pips
Update stop-loss via API when price moves favorably
userStories.notes: Implemented PositionManager with trailing stop tracking, ATR-based distance, activation threshold, and API integration

userStories.title: Partial Take-Profit Levels
userStories.description: As a trader, I want to take partial profits at multiple levels (TP1, TP2, TP3) to secure gains.
acceptanceCriteria: Calculate 3 TP levels based on ATR (1x, 2x, 3x ATR)
Close 50% at TP1, 30% at TP2, 20% at TP3
Move stop-loss to breakeven after TP1 hit
Track partial closes in trade log
Return TP levels in trade response
userStories.notes: Implemented 3-level partial TP (50/30/20% at 1x/2x/3x ATR), auto breakeven after TP1, partial close tracking

userStories.title: Economic Calendar API Integration
userStories.description: As a trader, I want the bot to know about upcoming high-impact economic events so that it can avoid trading during extreme volatility.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch events from Forex Factory or similar free source
Fetch events for next 24 hours on startup and every hour
Identify high-impact events (Fed rate decision, CPI, NFP, GDP)
Store events in memory with impact level (low/medium/high)

userStories.title: Trading Pause During High-Impact Events
userStories.description: As a trader, I want the bot to automatically pause trading 30 minutes before and 30 minutes after high-impact news events.
acceptanceCriteria: Create NewsFilter class that checks if trading is allowed
Configurable pause window (default: 30 min before, 30 min after)
High-impact events: Fed, CPI, NFP, GDP, Unemployment
/predict-and-trade endpoint checks news filter before trading
Returns news_paused: true with event details when blocked
Update n8n workflow to handle news pause response

userStories.title: News Sentiment API Integration
userStories.description: As a trader, I want the bot to analyze financial news sentiment to improve prediction accuracy.
acceptanceCriteria: Integrate NewsAPI or Alpha Vantage News API
Fetch gold-related news (keywords: gold, XAUUSD, precious metals, Fed, inflation)

userStories.title: FinBERT Sentiment Analysis
userStories.description: As a trader, I want news headlines analyzed for sentiment (bullish/bearish/neutral) to add as a prediction feature.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement FinBERT sentiment analysis using transformers library
Calculate aggregate sentiment score for last 4 hours
Cache sentiment scores to avoid recomputation

userStories.title: Trade History Database
userStories.description: As a trader, I want all trades logged to a database for performance analysis.
acceptanceCriteria: Create SQLite database for trade history
Log: timestamp, direction, entry, exit, P&L, signal, confidence
Filter by date range, direction, outcome

userStories.title: Performance Metrics API
userStories.description: As a trader, I want to see key performance metrics (win rate, profit factor, Sharpe ratio).
acceptanceCriteria: Calculate: win rate, profit factor, avg win/loss, max drawdown

userStories.title: Daily Performance Telegram Report
userStories.description: As a trader, I want a daily summary report sent via Telegram with my trading performance.
acceptanceCriteria: Include: trades taken, win rate, P&L, best/worst trade
Create n8n workflow daily-report.json for scheduled report
Beautiful formatted Telegram message with emojis
Schedule for 22:00 UTC on trading days

userStories.title: Multi-Timeframe Data Fetching
userStories.description: As a trader, I want the bot to analyze multiple timeframes (M5, M15, H1, H4) for better trend confirmation.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch data for M5, M15, H1, H4 timeframes from Capital.com
Store each timeframe's recent data (200 bars)

userStories.title: Timeframe Confluence Scoring
userStories.description: As a trader, I want a confluence score that shows when multiple timeframes agree on direction.
acceptanceCriteria: Calculate trend direction for each timeframe (EMA crossover)
Calculate RSI condition for each timeframe
Generate confluence score: 0-100% (100% = all timeframes agree)
Add confluence score to prediction output
Higher confluence = higher confidence in signal

userStories.title: Historical Data Storage
userStories.description: As a trader, I want historical price data stored locally for backtesting.
acceptanceCriteria: Download and store 1 year of M5 data for XAUUSD
Store in Parquet format for efficient access
Create scripts/update_historical.py to update data daily
API endpoint /api/historical returns data range info

userStories.title: Backtesting Engine
userStories.description: As a trader, I want to backtest the current strategy on historical data.
acceptanceCriteria: Apply same entry/exit logic as live trading
Track simulated P&L, drawdown, win rate

userStories.title: Walk-Forward Validation Report
userStories.description: As a trader, I want walk-forward validation to ensure the model isn't overfit.
acceptanceCriteria: Train on window N, test on window N+1
